FuncDef:
The common-name command sets the common name of the entity.
The undo common-name command deletes the common name of the entity.
By default, there is no common name for the entity.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the common name of the entity.
It is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. Except the question mark (?) and space. However, when double quotation marks (") are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The common-name command is used to describe an entity.
cn-name must be specified when entity information is configured.
